channel.title: Making a command that puts clothes on you?
channel.description:
Is there a way to make a command change your whole appearance?
Like i wanna do a command where if you ::jesus you automatically put on full desert and your hair changes into brown and long and you have a beard.
Anyone know what i could do for that?

item.title: Making a command that puts clothes on you?
item.dc:creator: @wowomgdotcom wowomgdotcom
item.description:
@wowomgdotcom wrote:

K thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 09:27:08 AM[/size][hr]Ok so i need to put this in but what do i put where the bla bla bla is?

if (command.startsWith("jesus")) { pHead = bla bla bla; pBeard = bla bla bla; sendMessage("bla bla bla"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 09:40:15 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but i need help really bad can someone pleae answer?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a command that puts clothes on you?

item.title: Making a command that puts clothes on you?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I ripped this off my head, so I don’t guarantee that this will work. if (commandstartsWith("whateveryouwant")) { { playerEquipment[playerHat]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerCape]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerChest]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerHands]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=xxxx; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=xxxx; }Try that, just change the x’s to the item ID you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a command that puts clothes on you?

item.title: Making a command that puts clothes on you?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

ya easy, cant do the wearing off hand though if (command.startsWith("jesus")) { pHead = bla bla bla; pBeard = bla bla bla; sendMessage("bla bla bla"); }

Read full topic
